name: Extra Credits Game Jam Prototype
description:
Spin-climb your way up as high as you can.

This is an early look at our entry to the Extra Credits 3rd game jam, themed "cycle". This prototype should be considered a demo of the main mechanics of the game with a focus on player movement. At this stage of development we are pretty happy with the movement mechanics, and need to start adding the art and designing the levels.

Feedback is very much appreciated.
